## Feature request

### Why?

> Describe why you are making this proposal, for example _"Adding a 'today' button in the menu would make it easier to quickly go to today's entry, which is a common use case"_

### What?

> Describe the changes you are proposing making to the project, for example: _"Add a primary button to the top of the left menu which navigates to `app/entry/today`"_
